title: Outdoor Fire Pit, Near Public Transportation, Playground
map_address: 711 West Casino Rd near Leasing Office
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 820 Sq.
Welcome to Arterra, a gorgeously landscaped community in Everett, WA offering newly renovated apartments and fabulous amenities.
Feel at home in a spacious, open-concept one or two bedroom apartment with nine-foot ceilings.
Gorgeous hardwood-style flooring and sleek stainless steel appliances in select homes will impress your guests.
Cozy up by the wood-burning fireplace or entertain your friends on your very own patio or balcony.
Laundry rooms, built-in desks and large closets ensure a convenient living experience.
Speak with the leasing team today to learn more.

Hardwood-Style Flooring*, Large Closets, Washer & Dryer in Unit, Renovated Homes**, Stainless Steel Appliances*, Garbage Disposals, Ceiling Fan, Wood Burning Fireplaces, Patio or Balcony, Cable & Internet Ready

Playground, Dog Park, Onsite Maintenance, Business Center, Easy Access to I5 & I405, Clubhouse, Onsite Management, Covered Parking, Near Public Transportation, Courtyard, Outdoor Fire Pit, BBQ & Picnic Area
Our apartments accommodate up to two pets per home, with no weight limit.
There is a $300 Pet Fee and Pet Deposit of $300.
Please call our leasing office for complete Pet Policy.
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
